goal.tools.mc.property

Interface PropState

  • All Superinterfaces:
    State
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LTL2AUTState

    public interface PropState
extends State
    Represents a property state of a program automaton as represented by implementations of Property.
    Author:
    sungshik

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LMHashSet<Formula> getFormulas()
      Gets the formulas that occur in this state.

      Gets the literals that occur in this state.

    • Method Detail

      • getFormulas

        LMHashSet<Formula> getFormulas()
        Gets the formulas that occur in this state.
        Returns:
        All formulas occurring in this state.

      • getLiterals

        LMHashSet<Formula> getLiterals()
        Gets the literals that occur in this state. Assumes that formulas occurring in this state are in negation normal form.
        Returns:
        The literals occurring in this state.
